response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us at $1,200,000, reflecting its unique qualities and exceptional craftsmanship. Given its significance, we are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. We believe this is an excellent opportunity for both parties, providing you with access to something truly remarkable while allowing us to share its value with someone who appreciates it deeply. Please let us know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
